details.top: The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) would prostrate in gratitude to Allaah (Subhaanahu wa Ta'aala) upon receiving news which pleased him or which caused pleasure.
details.reference: Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, At-Tirmithi. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Majah 1/233, and 'Irwa'ul-Ghalil 2/226.
